entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mont-Joli
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:06 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -12.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mont-Joli Airport 09:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -12.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -17.8°C
Wind: WNW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
